title: Kofi Annan talks business and human rights at IBA opening showcase session (IBA - International ...
text: ( Source : IBA - International Bar Association ) 05/10/ 2015 Kofi Annan , former Secretary-General of the United Nations , and John Ruggie , former UN Special Representative on Business and Human Rights , will discuss their vision of the UN Guiding
